title: Classic Zombie Sound Effects
description: Classic Zombie Sound Effects is a premium audio package with more than 250 zombie sounds
longDescription:
Classic Zombie Sound Effects is a package with more than 250 monster sound effects.

Click here to listen the demo.

Includes 3 different monster categories: Big Zombie, Classic Zombie and Vicious Zombie.

Classic Zombie:

Intended for a slow paced monster, mid to low tone, includes idle, attack, hit, moan, eating, growl and death sounds. This is the biggest package in the collection intended for the majority of enemies in your game.

Big Zombie:

Intended for a boss enemy, low tone, includes attack, death, hit, eating, roar and idle sounds.

Vicious Zombie:

Intended for a fast paced enemy, mid to high tone, includes attack, death, hit, eating, growl, hit, idle and trapped sounds.

All the sound files are named and idealized for the most common enemy actions such as "Hit" (when the monster gets a hit) "Attack" (When the monster is attacking) "Death" (when the enemy is eliminated) Idle, Roar, Moan and more, they are all labelled for ease of usage yet they can be used on many different purposes.


Update v2.0:

Compability with earlier versions improved.

New sounds added.


This pack is also included in the bundles:

ZOMBIE - SOUND EFFECTS BUNDLE

SURVIVAL HORROR - SOUND COLLECTION
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  3 different monster categories
  •  267 unique sounds covering the most important enemy actions
  •  High quality audio

Number of Audio Waves: 267

Number of Audio Cues: 267

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Mono WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 9:39
